title: Information regarding incident on 400 block of S Pearl on 9-1-2023

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Information regarding incident on 400 block of S Pearl on 9-1-2023
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1.	The complete police report related to the incident that occurred on the 400 block of South Pearl Street on September 1st 2023, involving a 52-year-old Schenectady man who is charged with menacing a woman with a semi-automatic long rifle.
	2.	Any and all bodycam footage from officers who responded to the incident on South Pearl Street on September 1st 2023.
	3.	Any and all additional materials, documents, or records that may be subject to FOIL, related to this incident and any ensuing action by the Albany Police Department or other entities involved.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jackson Parker
